title: Nice
comment: But no icon. Its just a white square, i had to uninstall because it looks out of place. But nice extension. I'm using oneplus one A0001

title: Generally useful, but shows outgoing calls as well
comment: It's great to be able to quickly return a call from this widget. Though, it will show the last call I made instead. Not sure if bug or working as intended. I think it is more useful to show only incoming calls, not outgoing ones.  Edit: The developer just replied to this review to explain why outgoing calls show up (so he/she can have a quick redial button). Seems to me he/she has given this more thought, and I’m happy to rate this the full 5-stars!
Hey there, I'll be adding a setting for selecting what type of call shows. Right now, it is by design to show the last call in the history, as I wanted a redial button on my lock screen.
